name: GetMonthlyListGrowthSummary
description:
Retrieve monthly summary of a list's growth activity.

Use this tool to get a detailed month-by-month summary of the growth activity for a specific list in Mailchimp. It provides insights into subscriber count changes over time.

parameters.name: list_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the specific list in Mailchimp. Required for retrieving growth activity.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: return_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of specific fields to return. Use dot notation for sub-object parameters.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields_to_return
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude from the response, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: records_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to return, with a default of 10 and a maximum of 1000.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination. Default is 0.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: sort_results_by_field
parameters.description: Specify the field by which results should be sorted. Use dot notation for sub-object fields.

value_schema.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field.

parameters.name: sort_order_direction
parameters.description: Determines the sorting order for the results, either ascending or descending.

value_schema.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.
